links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,3).
formula: a(n)=2a(n-2)+3a(n-3); a(n)=sum{k=0..floor(n/2), binomial(k, n-2k)2^k*(3/2)^(n-2k)}. - _Paul Barry_, Oct 16 2004
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 0, 2]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 2*Self(n-2)+3*Self(n-3): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 11 2012(PARI) Vec(1/(1-2*x^2-3*x^3)+O(x^99)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 26 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
